caption: A couple displays a deeply saddened demeanor, covering their faces with their hands as if sobbing uncontrollably, with two individuals beside them attempting to console them. Shortly after, three individuals exit the room. One of them, holding a magnifying glass, inspects a scene, seemingly collecting clues. This individual then meets another person in an office, who appears to be of significant stature, and the two share a cordial conversation, seemingly discussing very important matters. Elsewhere, in a room, two police officers, a man and a woman, are conversing. The woman is holding a file bag. In another location, inside a room, an overweight man is talking to two other men about something that seems to be of great importance.
